title: Bug 23787: [Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: The Project Properties Info page in the Properties dialog should not use text fields. Currently, in the integration build 09/17, this page looks bad on all motif platforms. On motif, these text fields automatically get borders, making them appear as user input targets. Furthermore, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX, these fields have different colored backgrounds, which makes them stand out even more.
OB: On motif platforms, the Project Properties Info page displays text fields with automatic borders, indicating them as user input targets. The fields on Solaris/AIX/HPUX also have different colored backgrounds, making them more noticeable.
EB: The Project Properties Info page on all motif platforms should not display text fields with automatic borders or different colored backgrounds. Instead, an alternative UI component should be used.
SR:
1. Open the Properties dialog for a project.
2. Navigate to the Info page.
3. Observe that text fields are displayed with automatic borders on motif platforms.
4. Observe that the text fields on Solaris/AIX/HPUX have different colored backgrounds.
